entry.data:
PARTLY CLOUDY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE AROUND 70
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN PARTLY SUNNY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 60S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE MORNING
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT
